content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 8-15)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler (position -5.0, 2.5)
- Steam engine (position 0.5, 6.5)
- Connected with pipe network (positions -8.5,-0.5 to -5.5,0.5)
- Small electric pole (position 0.5, 3.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Smelting Operation at position (19.5, 74.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill (position 19.5, 74.5)
- Wooden chest for ore collection (position 19.5, 76.5)
- Two stone furnaces (positions 20.0, 78.0 and 23.0, 78.0)
- Inserters (positions 21.5, 78.5 and 24.5, 78.5)
- Output wooden chest (position 25.5, 78.5)
- Connected with power poles (positions 10.5,45.5 to 31.5,46.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Persistent furnace input issues
- Iron ore not reaching furnaces despite inserters being placed
- Verify inserter orientation and pickup/drop positions
- Check power connection to all inserters
- Ensure chests have available ore and aren't blocked

### Belt connection errors
- Transport belts cannot connect directly to chests - must use inserters as intermediaries
- When redesigning ore transport, always include inserters between chests and belts

### Placement collision errors
- Check for existing entities before placing new ones (wooden chests, mining drills)
- Clear old entities completely before attempting new placements
- Verify terrain is suitable (not water) before placing mining drills

### Distance-related placement errors
- Move within 10 tiles of target position before placing entities
- Plan operations in local areas rather than trying to place entities far from current position

### Resource location errors
- Verify iron ore patches exist at target coordinates before attempting to mine
- Use get_resource_patch only on confirmed ore locations

### Power system issues
- Monitor boiler fuel levels to maintain consistent power generation
- Check power pole network coverage when adding new machines

## NAMESPACE

### Important Variables
- iron_patch: Position | None - Stores location of iron ore resources
- drill: Entity - Reference to mining drill entity
- furnace: Entity - Reference to smelting furnace entity
- output_chest: Entity - Reference to output storage chest
- belt: Entity - Reference to transport belt entity
